00040 // Underlying CCelFileData class expects backslashes rather than forward slashes on Windows hmmmm
00041 const string testFiles[] = 
00042 {
00043         "doesnt_exist.CHP",                                                                                                             // file does not exist - for testing when a file does not exist
00044 //      //"../../../TestDataFiles/CHP/GCOS104-U133a.CHP",
00045 //      //"../../../TestDataFiles/CHP/pcwrs041a_pd01.CHP",
00046 //      //"../../../TestDataFiles/CHP/NA02705_00243_01_3001197.CHP",
00047         "../../../TestDataFiles/CHP/10k_1-calvin.CHP",
00048 //      //"../../../TestDataFiles/CHP/T1_r1_stat.CHP",
00049 //      //"../../../TestDataFiles/CHP/T1_r1_v_T2_r1_stat.CHP",
00050         "../../../TestDataFiles/CHP/DCN_01_xda-calvin.CHP",
00051 //      //"../../../TestDataFiles/CHP/GCOS104-U133a-test_rel.CHP",
00052 //      //"../../../TestDataFiles/CHP/StatData_baseline.CHP",
00053         "../../../TestDataFiles/CHP/StatData-calvin.CHP",
00054         "../../../TestDataFiles/CHP/PLIERdata1-calvin.CHP"
00055 };
00056 const int FILE_NAME_LIST_COUNT = 5; // does not count the does not exist file case because we do not explicitly test it
00057 
00058 const int DOES_NOT_EXIST = 0;   // index into the file name array above of the file does not exist name
00059 
00060 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION(FusionCHPDataCalvinTest);

00062 // has to be called before each test
00063 void FusionCHPDataCalvinTest::setUp()
00064 {
00065 }
00066 
00067 // has to be called after each test
00068 void FusionCHPDataCalvinTest::tearDown()
00069 {
00070 }
00071 
00072 void FusionCHPDataCalvinTest::TestFileId()
00073 {
00074         if (FileUtils::Exists(testFiles[3].c_str()) == true)
00075         {
00076                 FusionCHPData *chp = FusionCHPDataReg::ReadHeader(testFiles[3]);
00077                 FusionCHPLegacyData *fusionChp = FusionCHPLegacyData::FromBase(chp);
00078                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionChp->FileId() == "0000065535-1131145034-0000006334-0000018467-0000000041");
00079                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionChp->GetGenericData()->FileIdentifier() == "0000065535-1131145034-0000006334-0000018467-0000000041");
00080         }
00081 }

00091 // main test entry method, calls the rest.
00092 // had to do it this way, because CPPUINT will not accept test method parameters
00093 void FusionCHPDataCalvinTest::TestAll()
00094 {
00095         // loop over each chp file to test
00096         for(int i = 1; i < FILE_NAME_LIST_COUNT; ++i)
00097         {
00098                 string fileName = testFiles[i];
00099                 if (FileUtils::Exists(fileName.c_str()) == false)
00100                         continue;
00101                 CreationTest(fileName);
00102                 tearDown();
00103                 setUp();
00104                 ReadHeaderTest(fileName);
00105                 tearDown();
00106                 setUp();
00107                 RowsColsTest(fileName);
00108                 tearDown();
00109                 setUp();
00110                 VersionTest(fileName);
00111                 tearDown();
00112                 setUp();
00113                 AlgorithmNameAndVersionTest(fileName);
00114                 tearDown();
00115                 setUp();
00116                 ChipTypeTest(fileName);
00117                 tearDown();
00118                 setUp();
00119                 ParentCelFileName(fileName);
00120                 tearDown();
00121                 setUp();
00122                 ProgIDTest(fileName);
00123                 tearDown();
00124                 setUp();
00125                 AlgParamsTest(fileName);
00126                 tearDown();
00127                 setUp();
00128                 SummaryParamsTest(fileName);
00129                 tearDown();
00130                 setUp();
00131                 NumberOfSetsTest(fileName);
00132                 tearDown();
00133                 setUp();
00134                 ReadHeaderAndVerifyAlgParamsTest(fileName);
00135                 tearDown();
00136                 setUp();
00137                 ReadHeaderAndVerifySummaryParamsTest(fileName);
00138                 tearDown();
00139                 setUp();
00140                 ReadTest(fileName);
00141                 tearDown();
00142                 setUp();
00143                 CallMethodsWhenObjectIsNotReadyTest(fileName);
00144                 tearDown();
00145                 setUp();
00146                 DataCompareTest(fileName);
00147                 tearDown();
00148                 setUp();
00149                 BackgroundDataTest(fileName);
00150         }
00151 }

00153 // test that we can read the chp header information
00154 void FusionCHPDataCalvinTest::ReadHeaderTest(string fileName)
00155 {
00156         FusionCHPData *chp = FusionCHPDataReg::ReadHeader(fileName);
00157         FusionCHPLegacyData *fusionChp = FusionCHPLegacyData::FromBase(chp);
00158         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionChp != NULL);
00159 
00160         CHPData calvinChp;
00161         CHPFileReader reader;
00162         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename(fileName));
00163         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(calvinChp));
00164 
00165         delete fusionChp;
00166 }

00168 // test the rows and colums
00169 void FusionCHPDataCalvinTest::RowsColsTest(string fileName)
00170 {
00171         CHPData calvinChp;
00172         CHPFileReader reader;
00173         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename(fileName));
00174         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(calvinChp));
00175 
00176         FusionCHPData *chp = FusionCHPDataReg::ReadHeader(fileName);
00177         FusionCHPLegacyData *fusionChp = FusionCHPLegacyData::FromBase(chp);
00178         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionChp != NULL);
00179 
00180         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - # rows!",fusionChp->GetHeader().GetRows() == calvinChp.GetRows());
00181         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - # cols!",fusionChp->GetHeader().GetCols() == calvinChp.GetCols());
00182         delete fusionChp;
00183 }

00214         delete fusionChp;

00230         delete fusionChp;

00249 // test the prog id
00250 void FusionCHPDataCalvinTest::ProgIDTest(string fileName)
00251 {
00252         CHPData calvinChp;
00253         CHPFileReader reader;
00254         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename(fileName));
00255         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(calvinChp));
00256 
00257         FusionCHPData *chp = FusionCHPDataReg::ReadHeader(fileName);
00258         FusionCHPLegacyData *fusionChp = FusionCHPLegacyData::FromBase(chp);
00259         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionChp != NULL);
00260 
00261         std::wstring progid;
00262         ParameterNameValueType paramType;
00263         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: ProgID not found in calvin file", calvinChp.GetFileHeader()->GetGenericDataHdr()->FindNameValParam(CHP_PROGID, paramType));
00264         progid = paramType.GetValueText();
00265         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - ProgID!", fusionChp->GetHeader().GetProgID() == progid);
00266         delete fusionChp;
00267 }
00268 
00269 // test the algorithm params
00270 void FusionCHPDataCalvinTest::AlgParamsTest(string fileName)
00271 {
00272         CHPData calvinChp;
00273         CHPFileReader reader;
00274         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename(fileName));
00275         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(calvinChp));
00276 
00277         FusionCHPData *chp = FusionCHPDataReg::ReadHeader(fileName);
00278         FusionCHPLegacyData *fusionChp = FusionCHPLegacyData::FromBase(chp);
00279         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionChp != NULL);
00280 
00281   FusionTagValuePairTypeList algParamsFusion;
00282   fusionChp->GetHeader().AlgorithmParameters(algParamsFusion);
00283   FusionTagValuePairTypeList::iterator beginFusion = algParamsFusion.begin();
00284   FusionTagValuePairTypeList::iterator endFusion = algParamsFusion.end();
00285 
00286         const ParameterNameValueTypeVector& algParamsCalvin = calvinChp.GetAlgParams();
00287         ParameterNameValueTypeVector::const_iterator beginCalvin = algParamsCalvin.begin(), endCalvin = algParamsCalvin.end();
00288 
00289         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(algParamsFusion.size() == algParamsCalvin.size());
00290 
00291         typedef map<wstring,wstring,less<wstring> > theFusionMap;
00292         theFusionMap map;
00293 
00294         // need the map to have an easy lookup for the key to see if the fusion has the key
00295         for (; beginFusion != endFusion; beginFusion++)
00296         {
00297                 map.insert(theFusionMap::value_type(beginFusion->Tag,beginFusion->Value));
00298         }
00299 
00300         theFusionMap::const_iterator findIt;
00301         for(; beginCalvin != endCalvin; beginCalvin++)
00302         {
00303                 // test single alg value call
00304                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare Algorithm Parameter!", fusionChp->GetHeader().GetAlgorithmParameter(beginCalvin->GetName().c_str()) == beginCalvin->ToString());
00305 
00306                 // test to see if the keys and values are the same between what was retrieved from fusion get algorithm params and
00307                 // with what was retrieved by the Calvin api
00308                 findIt = map.find(beginCalvin->GetName());
00309                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Faile: Algorithm parameter not found in Fusion list", findIt != map.end());
00310                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Faile: Algorithm parameter not found in Fusion list", findIt->second == beginCalvin->ToString());
00311         }
00312         delete fusionChp;
00313 }
00314 
00315 // tests the summary params
00316 void FusionCHPDataCalvinTest::SummaryParamsTest(string fileName)
00317 {
00318         CHPData calvinChp;
00319         CHPFileReader reader;
00320         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename(fileName));
00321         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(calvinChp));
00322 
00323         FusionCHPData *chp = FusionCHPDataReg::ReadHeader(fileName);
00324         FusionCHPLegacyData *fusionChp = FusionCHPLegacyData::FromBase(chp);
00325         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionChp != NULL);
00326 
00327   FusionTagValuePairTypeList sumParamsFusion;
00328   fusionChp->GetHeader().SummaryParameters(sumParamsFusion);
00329   FusionTagValuePairTypeList::iterator beginFusion = sumParamsFusion.begin();
00330   FusionTagValuePairTypeList::iterator endFusion = sumParamsFusion.end();
00331 
00332         const ParameterNameValueTypeVector& sumParamsCalvin = calvinChp.GetChipSums();
00333         ParameterNameValueTypeVector::const_iterator beginCalvin = sumParamsCalvin.begin(), endCalvin = sumParamsCalvin.end();
00334 
00335         typedef map<wstring,wstring,less<wstring> > theFusionMap;
00336         theFusionMap map;
00337 
00338         // need the map to have an easy lookup for the key to see if the fusion has the key
00339         for (; beginFusion != endFusion; beginFusion++)
00340         {
00341                 map.insert(theFusionMap::value_type(beginFusion->Tag,beginFusion->Value));
00342         }
00343 
00344         theFusionMap::const_iterator findIt;
00345         for(; beginCalvin != endCalvin; beginCalvin++)
00346         {
00347                 // test single alg value call
00348                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare Summary Parameter!", fusionChp->GetHeader().GetSummaryParameter(beginCalvin->GetName().c_str()) == beginCalvin->ToString());
00349 
00350                 // test to see if the keys and values are the same between what was retrieved from fusion get algorithm params and
00351                 // with what was retrieved by the calvin api
00352                 findIt = map.find(beginCalvin->GetName());
00353                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Faile: Algorithm parameter not found in Fusion list", findIt != map.end());
00354                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Faile: Algorithm parameter not found in Fusion list", findIt->second == beginCalvin->ToString());
00355         }
00356         delete fusionChp;
00357 }

00360 void FusionCHPDataCalvinTest::NumberOfSetsTest(string fileName)
00361 {
00362         // test the number of sets
00363         CHPData calvinChp;
00364         CHPFileReader reader;
00365         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename(fileName));
00366         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(calvinChp));
00367 
00368         FusionCHPData *chp = FusionCHPDataReg::ReadHeader(fileName);
00369         FusionCHPLegacyData *fusionChp = FusionCHPLegacyData::FromBase(chp);
00370         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionChp != NULL);
00371

00373         delete fusionChp;

00376 // tests the algorithm parameters
00377 void FusionCHPDataCalvinTest::ReadHeaderAndVerifyAlgParamsTest(string fileName)
00378 {
00379         // read the header with the fusion api
00380         FusionCHPData *chp = FusionCHPDataReg::ReadHeader(fileName);
00381         FusionCHPLegacyData *fusionChp = FusionCHPLegacyData::FromBase(chp);
00382         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionChp != NULL);
00383 
00384         // read the header with the calvin api
00385         CHPData calvinChp;
00386         CHPFileReader reader;
00387         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename(fileName));
00388         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(calvinChp));
00389 
00390         // get the calvin list
00391         ParameterNameValueTypeVector listCalvin = calvinChp.GetAlgParams();
00392         FusionTagValuePairTypeList listFusion;
00393         // get the fusion list
00394         fusionChp->GetHeader().AlgorithmParameters(listFusion);
00395 
00396         // test that the number of parameters are the same between a pure calvin file sdk call and the fusdion api call
00397         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - alg param count",listFusion.size() == listCalvin.size());
00398 
00399         // this section will test that the parameters read by both the pure calvin api and the fusion are the same
00400         // first we get the interators for the loop
00401         FusionTagValuePairTypeList::iterator beginFusion = listFusion.begin();
00402         FusionTagValuePairTypeList::iterator endFusion = listFusion.end();
00403         ParameterNameValueTypeVector::iterator beginCalvin = listCalvin.begin();
00404         ParameterNameValueTypeVector::iterator endCalvin = listCalvin.end();
00405 
00406         // loop over every parameter in the fusion parameter list and use it to get the value thru the getalgorithmparameter call
00407         // we could of used the value property of the of the iterator that is from the fusion algorithm list retrieved
00408         // early, but this is to exerise the get individual alg params api for both.
00409         // However, I will test the interator Value property from the fusion list and compare it to the other values returned from the
00410         // the get alg parameter calls
00411         for (; beginFusion != endFusion && beginCalvin != endCalvin ; beginFusion++, beginCalvin++)
00412         {
00413                 // get the fusion value for the parameter name
00414                 wstring tempFusion = fusionChp->GetHeader().GetAlgorithmParameter(beginFusion->Tag.c_str());
00415                 // get the calvin value for the parameter name
00416                 // have to convert the string to wstring first though
00417                 ParameterNameValueType tempCalvin = calvinChp.GetAlgParam(beginFusion->Tag);
00418 
00419                 // double check that the value from the fusion list is the same as the other values retieved from the get alg params calls
00420                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - params", tempFusion == tempCalvin.ToString() && beginFusion->Value == tempCalvin.ToString());
00421 
00422                 // check the Detail information
00423                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - params", beginFusion->DetailedType().GetName() == beginCalvin->GetName());
00424                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - params", beginFusion->DetailedType().GetParameterType() == beginCalvin->GetParameterType());
00425                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - params", beginFusion->DetailedType().ToString() == beginCalvin->ToString());
00426         }
00427         delete fusionChp;
00428 }
00429 
00430 // tests the summary parameters
00431 void FusionCHPDataCalvinTest::ReadHeaderAndVerifySummaryParamsTest(string fileName)
00432 {
00433         // read the header with the fusion api
00434         FusionCHPData *chp = FusionCHPDataReg::ReadHeader(fileName);
00435         FusionCHPLegacyData *fusionChp = FusionCHPLegacyData::FromBase(chp);
00436         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionChp != NULL);
00437 
00438         // read the header with the calvin api
00439         CHPData calvinChp;
00440         CHPFileReader reader;
00441         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename(fileName));
00442         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(calvinChp));
00443 
00444         // get the calvin list
00445         ParameterNameValueTypeVector listCalvin = calvinChp.GetChipSums();
00446         FusionTagValuePairTypeList listFusion;
00447         // get the fusion list
00448         fusionChp->GetHeader().SummaryParameters(listFusion);
00449 
00450         // test that the number of parameters are the same between a pure calvin file sdk call and the fusdion api call
00451         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - param list count",listFusion.size() == listCalvin.size());
00452 
00453         // this section will test that the parameters read by both the pure calvin api and the fusion are the same
00454         // first we get the interators for the loop
00455         FusionTagValuePairTypeList::iterator beginFusion = listFusion.begin();
00456         FusionTagValuePairTypeList::iterator endFusion = listFusion.end();
00457         ParameterNameValueTypeVector::iterator beginCalvin = listCalvin.begin();
00458         ParameterNameValueTypeVector::iterator endCalvin = listCalvin.end();
00459 
00460         // loop over every parameter in the fusion parameter list and use it to get the value thru the getsummaryparameter call
00461         // we could of used the value property of the of the iterator that is from the fusion summary list retrieved
00462         // early, but this is to exerise the get individual summary params api for both.
00463         // However, I will test the interator Value property from the fusion list and compare it to the other values returned from the
00464         // the get summary parameter calls
00465         for (; beginFusion != endFusion && beginCalvin != endCalvin ; beginFusion++, beginCalvin++)
00466         {
00467                 // get the fusion value for the parameter name
00468                 wstring tempFusion = fusionChp->GetHeader().GetSummaryParameter(beginFusion->Tag.c_str());
00469                 // get the calvin value for the parameter name
00470                 // have to convert the string to wstring first though
00471                 ParameterNameValueType tempCalvin = calvinChp.GetChipSum(beginFusion->Tag);
00472 
00473                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - params", tempFusion == tempCalvin.ToString() && beginFusion->Value == tempCalvin.ToString());
00474 
00475                 // check the Detail information
00476                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - params", beginFusion->DetailedType().GetName() == beginCalvin->GetName());
00477                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - params", beginFusion->DetailedType().GetParameterType() == beginCalvin->GetParameterType());
00478                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - params", beginFusion->DetailedType().ToString() == beginCalvin->ToString());
00479         }
00480         delete fusionChp;
00481 }
00482 
00483 // test the read method of fusion. This differs only from previous readheader tests in that instead of readheader being called
00484 // read is called.
00485 void FusionCHPDataCalvinTest::ReadTest(string fileName)
00486 {
00487         FusionCHPData *chp = FusionCHPDataReg::Read(fileName);
00488         FusionCHPLegacyData *fusionChp = FusionCHPLegacyData::FromBase(chp);
00489         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionChp != NULL);
00490 
00491         CHPData calvinChp;
00492         CHPFileReader reader;
00493         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename(fileName));
00494         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(calvinChp));
00495 
00496         // Check some header values
00497         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - version",fusionChp->GetHeader().GetVersion() == calvinChp.GetVersion());
00498         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - cols",fusionChp->GetHeader().GetCols() == calvinChp.GetCols());
00499         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - rows",fusionChp->GetHeader().GetRows() == calvinChp.GetRows());
00500         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - # probesets",fusionChp->GetHeader().GetNumProbeSets() == calvinChp.GetEntryCount());
00501         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - alg name",fusionChp->GetHeader().GetAlgName() == calvinChp.GetAlgName());
00502   CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - alg version",fusionChp->GetHeader().GetAlgVersion() == calvinChp.GetAlgVersion());
00503         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - chip type",fusionChp->GetHeader().GetChipType() == calvinChp.GetArrayType());
00504         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - parent cell name",fusionChp->GetHeader().GetParentCellFile() == calvinChp.GetParentCell());
00505         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - alg count",fusionChp->GetHeader().AlgorithmParameterCount() == calvinChp.GetAlgParams().size());
00506         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - sum count",fusionChp->GetHeader().SummaryParameterCount() == calvinChp.GetChipSums().size());
00507         //CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - prog id",fusionChp->GetHeader().GetProgID() == StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(calvinChp.GetHeader().GetProgID()));
00508         delete fusionChp;
00509 }

00524 // tests the main data of the chp file
00525 // currently supports expression, genotyping, universal, and soon resequencing
00526 void FusionCHPDataCalvinTest::DataCompareTest(string fileName)
00527 {
00528         // here we compare the data contents with both the calvin reader and the fusion reader and they better be the same
00529         FusionCHPData *chp = FusionCHPDataReg::Read(fileName);
00530         FusionCHPLegacyData *fusionChp = FusionCHPLegacyData::FromBase(chp);
00531         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionChp != NULL);
00532 
00533         CHPData calvinChp;
00534         CHPFileReader reader;
00535         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename(fileName));
00536         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(calvinChp));
00537 
00538         CHPExpressionEntry resultsCalvinExpression;
00539         FusionExpressionProbeSetResults resultsFusionExpression;
00540 
00541         CHPGenotypeEntry resultsCalvinGeno;
00542         FusionGenotypeProbeSetResults resultsFusionGeno;
00543 
00544         CHPUniversalEntry resultsCalvinUni;
00545         FusionUniversalProbeSetResults resultsFusionUni;
00546 
00547         u_int32_t count = fusionChp->GetHeader().GetNumProbeSets(); 
00548         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - # probesets",count == calvinChp.GetEntryCount());
00549 
00550 
00551         if(fusionChp->GetHeader().GetAssayType() == FusionExpression)
00552         {
00553                 // for each type supported, get the probeset results
00554                 // loop over the number of probesets
00555                 for(u_int32_t i = 0; i < count; ++i)
00556                 {
00557                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionChp->GetExpressionResults(i, resultsFusionExpression));
00558                         calvinChp.GetEntry(i, resultsCalvinExpression);
00559                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - DetectionPValue",resultsFusionExpression.GetDetectionPValue() == resultsCalvinExpression.GetDetectionPValue());
00560                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - Signal",resultsFusionExpression.GetSignal() == resultsCalvinExpression.GetSignal());
00561                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - Signal",resultsFusionExpression.GetNumPairs() == resultsCalvinExpression.GetNumPairs());
00562                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - NumPairs",resultsFusionExpression.GetNumUsedPairs() == resultsCalvinExpression.GetNumPairsUsed());
00563                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - Detection",resultsFusionExpression.GetDetection() == resultsCalvinExpression.GetDetection());
00564                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - m_HasCompResults",resultsFusionExpression.HasCompResults() == resultsCalvinExpression.GetHasComparisonData());
00565                         if (resultsFusionExpression.HasCompResults())
00566                         {
00567                                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - ChangePValue",resultsFusionExpression.GetChangePValue() == resultsCalvinExpression.GetChangePValue());
00568                                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - SignalLogRatio",resultsFusionExpression.GetSignalLogRatio() == resultsCalvinExpression.GetSigLogRatio());
00569                                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - SignalLogRatioLow",resultsFusionExpression.GetSignalLogRatioLow() == resultsCalvinExpression.GetSigLogRatioLo());
00570                                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - SignalLogRatioHigh",resultsFusionExpression.GetSignalLogRatioHigh() == resultsCalvinExpression.GetSigLogRatioHi());
00571                                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - NumCommonPairs",resultsFusionExpression.GetNumCommonPairs() == resultsCalvinExpression.GetCommonPairs());
00572                                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - Change",resultsFusionExpression.GetChange() == resultsCalvinExpression.GetChange());
00573         //                      CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - GetDetectionString",resultsFusionExpression.GetDetectionString() == resultsCalvinExpression.GetDetectionString());
00574         //                      CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - GetChangeString",resultsFusionExpression.GetChangeString() == resultsCalvinExpression.GetChangeString());
00575                         }
00576                 }
00577         }
00578         else if(fusionChp->GetHeader().GetAssayType() == FusionGenotyping)
00579         {
00580                 // for genotyping, we have a special case
00581                 // for 10k we only check curtain parameters are checked and in 100K other are checked.
00582                 // because we are not guaranteed to have properly initialized data from the files, we 
00583                 // have to make checks against the algorithm names.
00584                 // there are currently two.
00585                 // if there are any algs added in the future, we will need to update this else if to include it.
00586                 bool bWholeGenenome = false, bDynamicModel = false;
00587 
00588                 if(fusionChp->GetHeader().GetAlgName() == L"WholeGenome")
00589                 {
00590                         bWholeGenenome = true;
00591                 }
00592                 else if(fusionChp->GetHeader().GetAlgName() == L"DynamicModel")
00593                 {
00594                         bDynamicModel = true;
00595                 }
00596 
00597                 // for each type supported, get the probeset results
00598                 // loop over the number of probesets
00599                 for(u_int32_t i = 0; i < count; ++i)
00600                 {
00601                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionChp->GetGenotypingResults(i, resultsFusionGeno));
00602                         calvinChp.GetEntry(i, resultsCalvinGeno);
00603                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - AlleleCall",resultsFusionGeno.GetAlleleCall() == resultsCalvinGeno.GetCall());
00604                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - Confidence",resultsFusionGeno.GetConfidence() == resultsCalvinGeno.GetConfidence());
00605         //              CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - AlleleCallString",resultsFusionGeno.GetAlleleCallString() == resultsCalvinGeno.GetAlleleCallString());
00606 
00607                         if(bWholeGenenome)
00608                         {
00609                                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - RAS1",resultsFusionGeno.GetRAS1() == resultsCalvinGeno.GetRAS1());
00610                                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - RAS2",resultsFusionGeno.GetRAS2() == resultsCalvinGeno.GetRAS2());
00611                         }
00612                         else if(bDynamicModel)
00613                         {
00614                                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - pvalue_AA",resultsFusionGeno.GetPValueAA() == resultsCalvinGeno.GetAACall());
00615                                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - pvalue_AB",resultsFusionGeno.GetPValueAB() == resultsCalvinGeno.GetABCall());
00616                                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - pvalue_BB",resultsFusionGeno.GetPValueBB() == resultsCalvinGeno.GetBBCall());
00617                                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - pvalue_NoCall",resultsFusionGeno.GetPValueNoCall() == resultsCalvinGeno.GetNoCall());
00618                         }
00619                 }
00620         }
00621         else if(fusionChp->GetHeader().GetAssayType() == FusionUniversal)
00622         {
00623                 // for each type supported, get the probeset results
00624                 // loop over the number of probesets
00625                 for(u_int32_t i = 0; i < count; ++i)
00626                 {
00627                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionChp->GetUniversalResults(i, resultsFusionUni));
00628                         calvinChp.GetEntry(i, resultsCalvinUni);
00629                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - Background",resultsFusionUni.GetBackground() == resultsCalvinUni.GetBackground());
00630                 }
00631         }
00632         else if(fusionChp->GetHeader().GetAssayType() == FusionResequencing)
00633         {
00634                 FusionResequencingResults fusionResults;
00635                 fusionChp->GetReseqResults(fusionResults);
00636 
00637                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionResults.GetCalledBasesSize() == calvinChp.GetEntryCount());
00638                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionResults.GetForceCallsSize() == calvinChp.GetForceCnt());
00639                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionResults.GetOrigCallsSize() == calvinChp.GetOrigCnt());
00640 
00641                 const Int8Vector &fusionCalls = fusionResults.GetCalledBases();
00642                 const FloatVector &fusionScores = fusionResults.GetScores();
00643 
00644                 int sz = fusionResults.GetCalledBasesSize();
00645                 for (int i=0; i<sz; i++)
00646                 {
00647                         CHPReseqEntry calvinResult;
00648                         calvinChp.GetEntry(i, calvinResult);
00649                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionResults.GetCalledBase(i) == calvinResult.call);
00650                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionResults.GetScore(i) == calvinResult.score);
00651                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionCalls[i] == calvinResult.call);
00652                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionScores[i] == calvinResult.score);
00653                 }
00654 
00655                 FusionForceCallType fusionForce;
00656                 const FusionForceCallVector& fusionForces = fusionResults.GetForceCalls();
00657 
00658                 sz = fusionResults.GetForceCallsSize();
00659                 for (int i=0; i<sz; i++)
00660                 {
00661                         fusionForce = fusionResults.GetForceCall(i);
00662 
00663                         CHPReseqForceCall calvinForce;
00664                         calvinChp.GetForceCall(i, calvinForce);
00665 
00666                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionForce.GetPosition() == calvinForce.position);
00667                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionForce.GetCall() == calvinForce.call);
00668                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionForce.GetReason() == calvinForce.reason);
00669 
00670                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionForces[i].GetPosition() == calvinForce.position);
00671                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionForces[i].GetCall() == calvinForce.call);
00672                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionForces[i].GetReason() == calvinForce.reason);
00673                 }
00674 
00675                 FusionBaseCallType fusionOrig;
00676                 const FusionBaseCallVector& fusionOrigs = fusionResults.GetOrigCalls();
00677 
00678                 sz = fusionResults.GetOrigCallsSize();
00679                 for (int i=0; i<sz; i++)
00680                 {
00681                         fusionOrig = fusionResults.GetOrigCall(i);
00682 
00683                         CHPReseqOrigCall calvinOrig;
00684                         calvinChp.GetOrigCall(i, calvinOrig);
00685 
00686                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionOrig.GetPosition() == calvinOrig.position);
00687                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionOrig.GetCall() == calvinOrig.call);
00688 
00689                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionOrigs[i].GetPosition() == calvinOrig.position);
00690                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionOrigs[i].GetCall() == calvinOrig.call);
00691                 }
00692         }
00693         delete fusionChp;
00694 }
00695 
00696 // tests the background data for the chp file. This tests the backgroundzones, backgroundinfo and backgroundtype for each zone
00697 void FusionCHPDataCalvinTest::BackgroundDataTest(string fileName)
00698 {
00699         CPPUNIT_ADDITIONALMESSAGE_H
00700         // here we compare the background data contents with both the calvin reader and the fusion reader and they better be the same
00701         FusionCHPData *chp = FusionCHPDataReg::ReadHeader(fileName);
00702         FusionCHPLegacyData *fusionChp = FusionCHPLegacyData::FromBase(chp);
00703         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fusionChp != NULL);
00704 
00705         CHPData calvinChp;
00706         CHPFileReader reader;
00707         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename(fileName));
00708         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(calvinChp));
00709 
00710         BackgroundZoneInfo zoneInfoFusion;
00711         fusionChp->GetHeader().GetBackgroundZoneInfo(zoneInfoFusion);
00712 
00713         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - number_zones",zoneInfoFusion.number_zones == calvinChp.GetBackgroundZoneCnt());
00714 //      CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - smooth_factor",zoneInfoFusion.smooth_factor == zoneInfocalvin.smooth_factor);
00715         BackgroundZoneTypeList zonesFusion = zoneInfoFusion.zones;
00716 
00717 //      CHPBackgroundZoneVector calvinZones;
00718 //      calvinChp.GetBackgroundZones(0, ?, calvinZones);
00719 
00720         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - GetChangeString",zonesFusion.size() == calvinChp.GetBackgroundZoneCnt());
00721 
00722         BackgroundZoneTypeList::iterator beginFusion = zonesFusion.begin(), endFusion = zonesFusion.end();
00723 
00724         for(int32_t izone = 0; beginFusion != endFusion && izone < calvinChp.GetBackgroundZoneCnt(); beginFusion++, izone++)
00725         {
00726                 CHPBackgroundZone calvinZone;
00727                 calvinChp.GetBackgroundZone(izone, calvinZone);
00728                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - centerx",beginFusion->centerx == calvinZone.GetCenterX());
00729                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - centery",beginFusion->centery == calvinZone.GetCenterY());
00730                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT_MESSAGE("Failed: Compare - background",beginFusion->background == calvinZone.GetBackground());
00731         }
00732         delete fusionChp;
00733 }
